main_definition: based on random choice or personal whim, rather than any reason or system.

meanings_and_examples.definition: having no definite pattern; chosen at random
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher randomly selected students to answer questions in class.

meanings_and_examples.definition: based on the whim or arbitrary judgment of an individual
meanings_and_examples.example: The decision was made arbitrarily by the manager without consulting anyone else.

meanings_and_examples.definition: having no clear basis in fact or reason; seemingly random
meanings_and_examples.example: The selection process for the award seemed arbitrary and lacked transparent criteria.
His decision to penalize students arbitrarily was met with outrage from both parents and educators.
